title: Risou To Koi
alternative_title: My Ideal, My Love ; 理想と恋
status: My Ideal, My Love ; 理想と恋
description:
Description :
        Three original stories about adult women, ideals, and love. The first two are one chapter each, with a 3 part story for the end. 1 - Doorbell and Idol2 - Picnic3-5 - If a Lotus Should Bloom“My Ideal, My Love” has arrived! - a yuri anthology focusing on adults!An anthology focusing on the ideals and loves of women! Stories include a former idol X delivery driver, and a clothing sales clerk X baker. As each of them are adults, you get to see their struggles, their indecision, and how each of their ideals take shape. It’s now time for ideals and love!

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 3: If A Lotus Should Bloom (Part 1)
